DOC.detailed_description: The study randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , parallel-group , multicenter trial . It originally design last total 74 week : 8 week non.pharmacologic low-calorie ( 800 1000 kcl/d ) weight loss run-in phase , 8 week titration phase , 52 week maintenance phase , 6 week drug taper follow phase .
